class_notes: Open only to students in their final semester of the Environmental Management concentration. Enrollment by permission.
course_description: A course designed for advanced students on topics of interest in environmental sciences. This course may count as elective credit for the ENVS major and minor; relevant topics may count towards the ENVS Sustainability Sciences or Earth and Atmospheric Sciences minors. See current course atlas.
sections: Class Nbr: 2910, Section #: 2, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: U. Kitron, Status: Open
